item.description:
Hello everyone,

Welcome to the Boston Christian Mysticism Group. I am looking forward to meeting all of you and I want to invite you to get together the last sunday in September at 2 pm. The ongoing class on sundays at 11:30 still exists so if you interested please email me. But as far as this group is concerned, I would like to meet the last Sunday of every month at 2pm. Please let me know if another time works better. We will start with a guided meditation and then each month there will be a different topic to discuss, explore and Experience. Topics will include: Light, Love, Blessings, Prayer, Lives of the Saints, devotion...

All are welcome!

See you there.

In Light,
Rev Gabrielle
item.name: Monthly Christian Mystic Meet up!
